title: Golden Age of Video Games - Sega CD
description:
This is the Sega CD collection for the Golden Age of Video Games.

So, I spent over ten years playing full ROM collections (over 10,000 games) of previous generations of video games to create a collection that I feel represents the "golden age of video games". With this collection, posterity may now play a comprehensive collection of the best games (even the obscure ones) without tons of research or sorting through full ROM collections that are 95% crud.

Included games -

Bari-Arm
Dark Wizard
Earthworm Jim - Special Edition
Ecco
Ecco - The Tides of Time
Final Fight CD
Keio Flying Squadron
Lords of Thunder
Lunar
Lunar 2
Mickey Mania
Popful Mail
Rise of the Dragon
Road Avenger
Robo Aleste
Shining Force CD
Silpheed
Snatcher
Sonic CD
Vay
Wirehead
